comment.body:
It is a young biosystem, so just help it develop and wait. I believe that it will finally become a giant because decentralization is more and more 
significant in nowadays.
开局一个码剩下全靠编？能上到这里来的人智商都还在线吧
看到之前一个报道 由于两党冲突不实消息太多 委内瑞拉人民只能依靠自行鉴别社交媒体上的真假新闻获取社会动态
@Tlaurion: yes, and i believe that it will finally be something comparable to TOR
